Here is Mazhai Kuruvi Lyrics with English meaning / translation / words from Neela Mazhai Saaral Song Track, Chekka Chivantha Vaanam Flim

Basically this song is a story of a boy who met a girl ( portrayed as Sparrow(kuruvi) in this song, how both loved , how he feels after she goes away etc.  I tried this lyrics based on my understanding but the original meaning might vary.
